WorkItem.Description:
The latest 2.3, and 3 beta, have literally unusable optimization/build upgrade list speeds for ret pallies and dps warriors, at least for me. I checked my computer by using 2.2.28 and everything works fine. I tried a prot pally and a feral kitty on 2.3 and that also works fine. Any known issue with this for ret pallies/dps warriors? Rawr3 is unusable in nearly every fashion - every button press takes forever just to update through the browser, and the optimization is just as slow.
Â 
Please help! All versions of 2.2 I used religiously and I would love to continue using this awesome tool!

With this and several other "big and almost unusable" issues resolved and since it's been about 3 weeks since the last release; hopefully .21 will be out soon and that Rawr3 gets its update as well.
